Send push notification to this device { Ayla EVB Smart Plug Gateway Node { Registration Wifi Setup Wizard Step by step Wifi Setup Power up your EVB using a USB cable. Wait for the green LED to stop flashing. Power Select EVB Ready for Setup Select the entry below that matches the unique code on your EVB. Password should be at least 8 characters long Add Device I\'ve powered the EVB Rescan for EVBs Rescan for WiFi Networks Connecting to %s ... Discovering nearby networks... What type of device would you like to add? Advanced Personalize EVB Congratulations! You successfully added the EVB to your account and connected to the \"%s\" WiFi network.\n\nYour EVB can be customized by tapping the image, Device Name, or Time Zone. Return to Device List Reset EVB Reset the EVB by following these steps and then try setting it up again. Press and continue to hold down the blue button. Tap and release the black button. When the blue LED stops flashing, release the blue button. Repeat Setup Required permissions are missing. Not available at this time.
